text: welcome back in our last video we set up
our QA chat bot designer with questions
and answers and we tested the experience
in this video we will show you how you
can enable multi-language support for
your chat experience this can help with
cases when your users may be more
comfortable asking questions and getting
answers in their native language queue a
chat bot supports this functionality out
of the box by enabling a configuration
setting let's walk through the steps to
configure language support in your AWS
console navigate to the services menu
and select systems manager from here
select the parameter store option on the
Left select the custom Q&A box settings
and edit the settings create a new value
and save the setting now you have
enabled QA chat bot with multi-language
support let's try it out open the Q&A
about client and ask a question let's
use Spanish notice that the Q&A chat bot
is
able to understand a question in Spanish
and provide the answer back in Spanish
if you'd like to customize the
translation and provide your own version
of translation text you can do that by
using the handlebars functionality in
the Q&A chat bot designer for example in
this question you see customized answers
for languages and handlebars are used to
define the language specific answers
feel free to explore the Q&A chat bot
designer and client experience thanks
for watching
